text: Sam Derakhshani (; 22 July 1975 in Tehran) is an Iranian actor. He started his acting career with Shab-Zadeghan directed by Amir Hossein Ghahraei in 1999. He became more famous by acting in "Pejman" series directed by Soroush Sehhat. ==References== * Category:Actors from Tehran Category:Living people Category:1975 births
title: Sam Derakhshani
